ðŸ“– Summary: The WordPecker App is a personalized language-learning tool that combines Duolingo-style lessons with custom vocabulary lists. Users can add words from various sources like books and videos, then practice them through interactive quizzes and LLM-generated lessons. The app aims to make vocabulary acquisition more efficient and personalized.
